columns.name: common_name
columns.description: The common name for the certificate.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The function that the registered certificate performs. Valid values include ClientLDAPS or ClientCertAuth. The default value is ClientLDAPS.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The state of the certificate. Valid values: Registering | Registered | RegisterFailed | Deregistering | Deregistered | DeregisterFailed.

columns.name: expiry_date_time
columns.description: The date and time when the certificate will expire.

columns.name: registered_date_time
columns.description: The date and time that the certificate was registered.

columns.name: state_reason
columns.description: Describes a state change for the certificate.

columns.name: client_cert_auth_settings
columns.description: A ClientCertAuthSettings object that contains client certificate authentication settings.
